sentences.en: A building did not burn and yet arson was committed.
sentences.cn: 建筑未被烧毁,可是构成了纵火罪.

sentences.en: All the evidence points to arson.
Every year one in eight schools suffers a serious arson attack.
sentences.cn: 每年都有八分之一的学校遭受严重的纵火袭击.

sentences.en: He carries gas with him and wants to commit arson.
sentences.cn: 他身上带有汽油,准备纵火.

sentences.en: He was arraigned on a charge of arson.
sentences.cn: 他因被指控犯纵火罪而被传讯.

sentences.en: He was brought to trial on charges of arson.
sentences.cn: 他以纵火罪被送法院审理.

sentences.en: He was serving a ten spot for arson.
sentences.cn: 他因纵火罪在服十年徒刑.

sentences.en: Murder and arson, drug trafficking, smuggling and the brutal crazy.
sentences.cn: 杀人放火 、 贩毒走私、残暴疯狂.

sentences.en: Seven men, all from Bristol, admitted conspiracy to commit arson.
sentences.cn: 7个人都来自布里斯托尔，他们承认了合谋纵火。

sentences.en: The arson was in retaliation for the killing of their friend.
sentences.cn: 恶意纵火是为了替被杀害的朋友报仇.

sentences.en: The jury convicted the accused man of theft and arson.
sentences.cn: 陪审团宣判被告犯有偷窃和纵火罪.

sentences.en: The principal felonies are homicide, rape, theft, robbery, burglary and arson.
sentences.cn: 主要的重罪包括杀人罪 、 奸罪 、 窃罪 、 劫罪 、 犯住宅罪和放火罪.

sentences.en: The school was destroyed in an arson attack.
sentences.cn: 那所学校毁于一次纵火袭击。

sentences.en: They vented their anger by carrying out arson attacks.

trans.tran_en: the crime of deliberately making something burn, especially a building
